title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2588/94 of 25 October 1994 amending Regulation (EC) No 2500/94 establishing the allocations to importers of toys falling within CN code 9503 41 from the additional quantitative quota introduced by Council Regulation (EC) No 1921/94
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2588/94 of 25 October 1994 amending Regulation (EC) No 2500/94 establishing the allocations to importers of toys falling within CN code 9503 41 from the additional quantitative quota introduced by Council Regulation  (EC) No 1921/94
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 1 of Regulation (EC) No 2500/94 '79,759 %' is hereby rectified to read '80,432 %' as the rate of reduction applicable to traditional importers.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 15 October 1994.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 October 1994.
For the Commission
Leon BRITTAN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 66, 10. 3. 1994, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 265, 15. 10. 1994, p. 49.
(3) OJ No L 198, 30. 7. 1994, p. 1.
